definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Lipase N435 was screened as catalyst, and tert-butanol as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出脂肪酶N435作爲催化劑，叔丁醇作爲溶劑。

sentences.english: The active sites of Akebia quinala (Thunb. ) Dence. and Areca catechu L are N butanol extracts.
sentences.chinese: 木通和檳榔的活性部位爲正丁醇提取物。

sentences.english: The esterification of acetic acid with n-butanol by dealuminated USY zeolite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脫鋁超穩Y沸石催化乙酸與正丁醇的酯化反應。

sentences.english: It can be used without modifying automobile engines, and is less corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 利用丁醇不需改造汽車引擎，並且丁醇腐蝕性較小。

sentences.english: It can be used without modifying automobile engines, and is less corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 利用丁醇不需改造汽車引擎，並且丁醇腐蝕性較小。

sentences.english: Biobutanol will be the first of those biofuels to reach global markets.
sentences.chinese: 生化丁醇將是最早推向市場的這類生物燃料。

sentences.english: To investigate the anti-inflammatory mechanism of n-butanol extract from Melilotus suaveolens Ledeb(MSL) in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究草木犀正丁醇提取物在體外的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: The selectivity of IB hydration increased with the initial content of water in ethanol.
sentences.chinese: 叔丁醇的選擇性隨初始水含量的增大而增大。

sentences.english: The butanol extraction is an effective method of isolation of swainsonine from the solution of Metarhizium anisopliae.
sentences.chinese: 正丁醇萃取法是從發酵液中提取苦馬豆素的有效方法。

sentences.english: In addition, Pyrazinamide and Ethambutol are also given for the first two months of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 此外，吡嗪酰胺和乙胺丁醇也給予首兩個月的治療。

sentences.english: Diisobutyl acetal was synthesized by the condensation of paraldehyde and iso-butyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 以三聚乙醛和異丁醇爲原料，合成了二異丁基乙縮醛。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the chemical constituents from the roots of Reineckia carnea.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究產自湖北長陽吉祥草正丁醇部位化學成分。

sentences.english: The production of s-butanol is greatly stimulated with the increase in demand for methyl ethyl ketone worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 世界甲乙酮需求量的擴大促進了仲丁醇的生產。

sentences.english: Esterification of acetic acid with sec-butanol catalyzed by sodium hydrogen sulfate was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乙酸和仲丁醇在硫酸氫鈉催化下的反應。

sentences.english: Application tert-butanol increase the efficiency of phosphate utilization and absord when the phosphate-limited.
sentences.chinese: 叔丁醇提高了低磷情況下植物對磷的吸收和利用。

sentences.english: Lipase N435 was screened as the catalyst, and tert-butanol was used as the solvent.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出脂肪酶N435作爲催化劑，叔丁醇作爲溶劑。

definition: ethanol C2H5OH/same as alcohol 酒精
